summary: Adds one new katana - Shinuchi sakabato, used by Himura Kenshin from anime and manga "Rurouni Kenshin".
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=4]THIS MOD IS A FREE PRODUCT, CREATED OUT OF A PERSONAL LOVE FOR SKYRIM AND WITH RESPECT TO COMMUNITY. AS SUCH, THIS MOD WILL ALWAYS REMAIN FREE OF CHARGE, AND I DO NOT WANT ANY OF THIS MOD'S ASSETS TO BE USED FOR THE PAID MODS ON THE STEAM WORKSHOP; THAT INCLUDES THE 3D MODELS, TEXTURES AND EVEN ESP/ESM FILES AS MASTER DEPENDENCIES.[/size][/b][/center]

[img]http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/9130/39716881.png[/img]

[img]http://img815.imageshack.us/img815/8328/title01.png[/img]

Adds one new sword - Shinuchi sakabato to the game.
This sword used by Himura Kenshin from anime "Rurouni Kenshin".
Himura Kenshin is a fictional character in the anime and manga series Rurouni Kenshin, also known as Samurai X. During the revolution, Kenshin was a former assassin who has mastered the technique of Battojutsu (sword drawing technique) and could draw his sword with lightning speed.
After the revolution, Kenshin has vowed not to kill anyone and was used with a reverse blade sword (sakabato). He became a wanderer (Rurouni) and helped those in need, to atone for his murder.

The edge of the blade of this sakabato is on the inside of the curve of the blade. This feature is unique and enables to use a variation of techniques including short blade slashes and parries with an immediate counter strike.

Sakabato(reverse bladed sword) is a sword that wasn't meant to be used to kill. There were two indentical swords that was made at the same time(according to Rorouni Kenshin's manga and anime). One was named Kageuchi, which was broken when Kenshin fought Seta Soujiro. The other one was named Shinuchi. Kenshin used this sword to defeat all of his anemies including Makoto Shishio and Yukishiro Enishi.

[img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/489/46052692.png[/img]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img14/2374/qdnx.png[/img]

There are two ways to use sakabato. You can use blunt and sharp sides of the blade. When equipping a sword you'll get a new spell, which can turn sword and use different sides of blade.

The sword is slightly different from the analogue of the anime - i added some detail to tsuba, fuchi and kashira to make it more realistic.
Creation of sword took 1 month of my life. Model and textures are maximum detailed.

I hope you like it.
Please enjoy new sword ^_^

[img]http://img525.imageshack.us/img525/7298/30443475.png[/img]

[img]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/4347/ntitle01.png[/img]

Fixed perk issue.
Blunt side of sakabato similar to blunt weapons (not tested)
Sharp side similar to one handed sword
Sakabato get perk effects from one handed weapon skill tree

Sakabato is not enchantable or upgradable on Grindstone, because of new specific spell that changing sides of blade. But i believe its powerfull enough.

[img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/4840/ntitle02.png[/img]

The sword is for sale in a "Bits and Pieces" in the Solitude

[img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/2603/ntitle03.png[/img]

1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)Steamsteamappscommonskyrimdata
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the OdemsSakabato.esp.

[img]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/3388/ntitle04.png[/img]

1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the OdemsSakabato.esp.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

1) as you don't charge money for it
2) as you credit and notify me for any work used
3) as you use it for Skyrim only

Please do not re-host this file without my explicit permission.
No upload to Steam Workshop.
